n0:runOracleScript.n0:source: prompt --application/shared_components/security/authentications/application_express_accounts begin -- Manifest -- AUTHENTICATION: Application Express Accounts -- Manifest End wwv_flow_api.component_begin ( p_version_yyyy_mm_dd=>'2020.10.01' ,p_release=>'20.2.0.00.20' ,p_default_workspace_id=>9748850854216151 ,p_default_application_id=>103 ,p_default_id_offset=>0 ,p_default_owner=>'DEMO' ); wwv_flow_api.create_authentication( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(20167393276402644) ,p_name=>'Application Express Accounts' ,p_scheme_type=>'NATIVE_APEX_ACCOUNTS' ,p_invalid_session_type=>'LOGIN' ,p_use_secure_cookie_yn=>'N' ,p_ras_mode=>0 ); wwv_flow_api.component_end; end;
